name: 2025 4th International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering (IC-MSE 2025)
content: 2025 4th International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering (IC-MSE 2025) will be held in Nha Trang, Vietnam during Feb 19-21, 2025\. The IC-MSE 2019 had been held in Kyoto, Japan during Dec 26-28, 2019\. The IC-MSE 2021 had been held online. The IC-MSE 2022 had been Co-organized by Suzhou University of Science and Technology, China during May 20-22, 2022\. All the accepted and registered papers of ICMSE 2025 will be published in the Journal of Materials Science Forum (ISSN web 1662-9752), which will submitted to be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc. \*The high quality papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in Materials, 5-Year Impact Factor: 3.920 (2020). Or Journal of King Saud University- Engineering Sciences (JKSUES), which is abstracting and indexing in Scopus, Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ), Ei Compendex. Please submit your paper to mail: ic-mse@isaeri.org Prof. Tran Hung Tra from Mechanical Faculty, Nha Trang University, Vietnam will be our keynote speaker. IC-MSE 2025 www.ic-mse.org Conference Secretary: Ms. Alice Liu E-mail: ic-mse@isaeri.org Address: Unit 17, 9/F. Tower A New Mandarin Plaza, No 14 Science Museum RD TST, KL, Hong Kong Tell: +852-3075-6685
